main event: Observer reports sighting of a strange object, a flat, saucer-shaped object with a brilliant, glowing light in Palmdale, California on March 28, 1958.
interesting points: The object was in a fixed position before making a quick departure without any sound.,The observation lasted for about 10 minutes.,The object exhibited an erratic course.,The observer stated that the object was definitely not similar to any known aircraft.,No photographs were contained in the report as it appeared to be a record card from an old project.
sighted object: a flat, saucer-shaped object with a brilliant, glowing light
witness description: Observer described the object as a flat, saucer-shaped object in a fixed position
